p: Some reports are describing the serotonin transporter regulating the activity of compounds from Nardostachys species, like sesquiterpenoids and nardonaphthalenones [ 78, 79]. Serotonin transporter is responsible for the reuptake of 5-hydroxytryptamine into presynaptic neurons and plays an important role in the pathophysiology of neuropsychiatric conditions, like depression, anxiety, or obsessive-compulsive disorder.
